help-file.title: MALISON
help-file.content:
Area of effect: <victim> Aggressive: Yes Cumulative: No Duration: Dependent on proficiency of caster Type of spell: Spiritual
"Malison" curses the victim, causing him to be more susceptible to magical attacks. "Malison" can be cured with the spell "Purify Spirit" or the duration it lasts can be shortened by the spell " id".
